PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03982018-04-03,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Hazardous Products Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to provide industry with the option to use prescribed concentration ranges rather than actual chemical ingredient concentrations or concentration ranges on Safety Data Sheets for hazardous workplace products in Canada rather than submitting Confidential Business Information applications under the Hazardous Material Information Review Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0068 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment
